story_parts.text: A lion was walking through the jungle when he came across a city. He had never seen a city before and was curious to see what it was like. He walked into the city and saw all the tall buildings and busy people. He walked around for a while, taking everything in. He even saw a few other lions in the city. After a while, he decided to head back to the jungle. He had seen enough of the city for now and wanted to go home.
next_options: The lion walks back to the jungle and never comes back to the city
The lion likes the city and decides to stay there
story_parts.selected_option: The lion walks back to the jungle and never comes back to the city

story_parts.text: The lion walks back to the jungle and never comes back to the city. He is content with life in the jungle and doesn't need the hustle and bustle of the city.
next_options: The lion continues to live in the jungle and is happy
The lion gets bored of the jungle and decides to go back to the city
